name: Again (itch) (dalajnikon)
description:
Description

This game is an entry for the Godot Wild Jam #49 with a theme UNSTABLE.

Controls
  • A/D or arrows to move left/right
  • Space to jump and hold onto the walls
Game

The inspiration came from the Celeste game (specifically from B-Side Cassette Tape levels) and how rhytmic it was. My idea for the jam's theme was to create that experience but with an unstable time between the tile switches (as in the tile will change with a fixed but different timing).

The story of Again is about a struggle that everyone experiences and how in the beginning it feels just like walking on thin ice. When you go through with it you learn it and the next time is much easier than the first, and so on.

The "Unstable" theme for me was about the feeling of unstableness and how it is mirrored in our minds, like walking on the ground that might soon perish.

Credits
  • Music by ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
  • Soundbite "Sound Effects - Finger snap with reverb" by ShidenBeatsMusic
  • Character and sounds created by Sven (https://sventhole.itch.io/)
  • Clock sound created by knufds
  • Wind sound created by cobratronik
